name: Forest of the Lilies
description:
"Forest of the Lilies" is a short story written, illustrated, and presented by Morimoto Hisayo for her mothers. Based on classic German fairy tales, with a uniquely-Japanese twist, this story tells of a young girl who leaves her village to find a new place to live.

Created for Yuri Game Jam 2016 as a spin-off / alternative to my original concept, which ended up being too involved to be completed in one month.
